name: Duck Inc
description:
Duck Inc. is an incremental(clicker) game, the theme revolves around a group of hard-working ducks and managers (you).

You need to hire ducks with different skills to work for you, and Don't forget to urge your staff to make them work harder!

Also, strengthen your Inc by learning skill tree skills!

Features

  • Simple and fun, you can play at any time, anywhere!
  • Duck and ..... more Ducks!
  • Unique skill tree!
  • Milestones and Mission!
